scripts.dev:bg: bash -c 'nohup npm run dev >/dev/null 2>&1 & echo $! > .vite-dev.pid; echo Started Vite in background PID $(cat .vite-dev.pid)'
scripts.dev:stop: sh -c 'if [ -f .vite-dev.pid ]; then PID=$(cat .vite-dev.pid); if kill $PID 2>/dev/null; then echo Stopped Vite PID $PID; else echo PID $PID not running; fi; rm -f .vite-dev.pid; else echo No PID file; fi'
